pages.text: $(2)Lost City$() is a dimension made of deserted cities and the fastest way to obtain a $(6)City Defender Medal$(). Here's how you can go into it.$(br2)$(c)If you created a world with one of the Lost City presets, you can't go there because you are already in it.$()$(br2)$(5)Please make sure you take enough items to build another portal because a return portal will not be generated.$()
Right click the bed to enter Lost City! Skeleton skull can be replaced with any skull and the glass can be replaced with any block.$(8)(Sorry I can't get this multiblock to display in the right way)
